ingredients: 1 lb. lasagna noodles
1 lb. ground beef
ricotta cheese
1/2 cup grated parmesan cheese
1/2 cup grated mozzarella cheese
instructions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
In a medium frying pan, heat 1/2 cup of the oil on medium-high until hot.
Add the ground beef and cook until browned, 3 to 5 minutes.

recipes.title: Test
ingredients: 1 cup pancake mix
1 cup milk
1/2 cup butter, melted
1/2 cup sugar
1/2 cup water
1 egg
1/2 teaspoon salt
1/2 teaspoon pepper
instructions: Mix all ingredients together in a bowl.
Heat a nonstick pan over medium heat.
Butter the pan.
Pour batter into pan.
Cook until bubbles appear on the surface and the edges are cooked.

Flip and cook until browned and cooked through.
Serve immediately.
